data.title: Letter Buckets
data.statement: You must output each character of the input as newline-separated buckets. The buckets must be output in ASCII order.

data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> All instances of the character with the lowest ASCII value in the input.
<<Line N:>> All instances of the character with the [[N]]th lowest ASCII value in the input.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You must output each character of the input as newline-separated buckets. The buckets must be output in ASCII order.
Input
Line 1: A string containing N ASCII characters.
Output
Line 1: All instances of the character with the lowest ASCII value in the input.
Line N: All instances of the character with the Nth lowest ASCII value in the input.
Constraints
0 < [N] < 100
Example
Input
Banana
Output
B
aaa
nn
